short_summary: Requisition of various dangerous goods publications to be provided for use by Department of National Defence – CFB Borden.
description: By implementing a Competition FIT (FIT_GDMED) using Ariba Discovery (formerly BidExpress), a selection of competition-restricted goods and services (CRGs) have been excluded from competition. Once a supplier has been selected, they will work with the FMOD to move the new good/service to the competition-open area for future procurements. For compliance with the Access to Information Act R.S.C., 1985, c A-1 and the Privacy Act R.S.C., 1985, c P-21, the department has implemented this competitive bidding environment to ensure compliance.
